title: Home on Peaceful Property
posting_body: A spacious home on peaceful lot, with pond, gravel circle driveway and nice yard.
Split level home has living room with wood burning fireplace, two dining rooms, kitchen, office, bedrooms and bathrooms located upstairs.
A large, open bonus room located downstairs with gas fireplace, bathroom and laundry.
Home also offers a 2 car garage and large back deck.
A pet is negotiable with owner approval and additional pet deposit.
For more information and photos please visit us at <URL>
